actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from OMB.
Committee on Veterans received executive comment from OMB.

official_title: A bill to limit payment of special pay authorized eligible Veterans Administration physicians and dentists under section 4118, title 38, United States Code, and for other purposes.
short_title: Veterans Administration Special Pay Amendments of 1981

summary.text: Veterans' Administration Special Pay Amendments 1981 - Limits the amount of appropriations which may be expended for special pay for physicians and dentists in the Veterans Administration's Department of Medicine and Surgery.

titles.title: Veterans Administration Special Pay Amendments of 1981
A bill to limit payment of special pay authorized eligible Veterans Administration physicians and dentists under section 4118, title 38, United States Code, and for other purposes.
